CustomField.description: Change logic to accommodate Ship To Score, contract pricing
CustomField.formula: CASE( CPQ2_ASN__c, 1, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green") + ' Approved', 2, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Yellow") + ' Requires Approval', 3, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red") + ' Requires Approval', IMAGE("/img/permissions_deny16.gif", "Denied") + ' Requires Adjustment to Proceed')
CustomField.label: Approval Status
